title: Development of an automated SILAR method for the sustainable fabrication of BiOI/TiO₂ photoanodes

BiOI is a promising material for use in photoelectrocatalytic water oxidation, renowned for its chemical inertness and safety in aqueous media. For device integration, BiOI must be fabricated into films....
